title: Old Lion (Alter Löwe) (in-text plate, page 9) from Tierfabeln des Aesop (Aesop's Fables)
medium: One from an illustrated book with thirty-five woodcuts (including woodcut cover, title page and ornamental initials)
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 2 15/16 x 5" (7.4 x 12.7 cm); page: 13 x 9 1/16" (33 x 23 cm)
